name: MODERN MOTO (MANUFACTURER FULL-STACK WEBSITE)
detail: Use Google And Email/Password Authentication System So A User And An Admin Must Log In First. The User And Admin Data Will be Save In The Database. After Login A User Can Purchase The Parts And Pay By Credit Card (Stripe). User Can See Their Purchase History And Give Reviews. Admin Can See All Users’ Purchase History And Add Another Email As An Admin. An Admin Also Can Manage (Add, Delete) The Parts.
tech: React, React-router, Private-route, Bootstrap, React-bootstrap, React Form Hooks, React Query, Express Js, MongoDB, React Firebase Hooks, Heroku, Stripe.

name: MOTOR MANIA (WAREHOUSE-MANAGEMENT FULL-STACK WEBSITE)
detail: Motor Mania Is A Fully Responsive Website Where Bike Riding Accessories Are Available. Use Google, GitHub, And Email/Password Authentication System So A User Must log in First After Login A User Can Add Products, Delete, And Update Products.
tech: React, React-router, Private-route, Bootstrap, React-bootstrap, React Form Hooks, Express Js, MongoDB, React Firebase Hooks, Heroku.

name: FITNESS FRIENDS (INDEPENDENT SERVICE PROVIDER FRONT-END WEBSITE)
detail: It’s A User-Friendly Website Where Gym Training Services Are Available. Use Google, GitHub, And Email/Password Authentication System So A User Must log in First. After Login A User Can Purchase The Training Services.
tech: React, React-router, Private-route, Bootstrap, React-bootstrap, React Firebase Hooks.

name: A BITE OF YUMMY
detail: Create A Dashboard Where Monthly Sell And Investment Are Available. Customer Review Ar Also Available
